Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/California
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, due to fire department activity near 35th/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, due to fire department activity near 35th/California.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
